result.execSummary:
The defendant Trevor D Thibado was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manuf/Deliver Amphetamine(<=3g) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(e)1.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: from DOC requesting the court authorize release & convert remaining time to extended supervision

Defendant, Trevor D Thibado, in custody, appeared with Attorney Donna Burger.  Prosecuting attorney Andrew John Maki.  Defendant in custody.  Kim Silvius - Clerk

State - filed Amended Information in 15CF285 and Amended Crim Comp in 15CF341
State - plea to Ct 1 in 15CF341 and 15CF285 Ct 1 - dismiss remaining charges - 6 yrs prison - 3 yrs IC 3 yrs ES on each count concurrent 10CF97 10 CF164  - $268 $250 dna on ea. $ 10 drug sur AODA $180 rest 15CF405 readin - no contact w/D.T. 2/4 55 & B.T. 6-23-63

Deft - 15CF341 - waives prelim hearing
          15CF285 - Ct 1 pleads no contest) waives rights & JT
          15CF341 - Ct 1 pleads no contest)  waives rights & JT

COURT:
15CF341 - waiver of prelim vol. - finds pc for bind over - strikes "amended" on the filing in court of Information
                   pleas voluntary to both 15CF285 Ct 1 & 15CF341 Ct 1 - finds deft guilty of both

15CF285 Ct 1 - repeater striken from amended information
                 6 yrs prison - 3 yrs IC & 3 yrs ES - CONCURRENT 15CF341 and revocation on 10CF97, 11CF164
                 $268 cc
                 $250 dna surchg
                 $  10 drug surchg 
credit 67 days
15CF341 Ct 1 - 
                 6 yrs prison - 3 yrs IC & 3 yrs ES - concurrent to 15CF285 & revocation 10CF97 & 11CF164

 credit 30 days

CONDITIONS OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION:

eligible for challenge incarceration & substance abuse program on both files
